overview: Within the backdrop of a vibrant house party, 'Downing' explores the complicated minefield of teenage sexuality as John, the isolated local gay lad, finds an opportunity to exact revenge on his straight oppressor, the popular and handsome Daniel.

production_companies.name: Edinburgh Skillset Screen and Media Academy

tagline: Boy kisses boy. Drinking, screwing and regret: Just another teenage party.
title: Downing
